content: MFT-ISO Insulation Thermal insulation pad to separate the bracket from the underlying surface ### Categories: Home > Products > Facade mounting systems > Accessories for façade systems ### FEATURES:Features Thermal isolation of the wall bracket from the supporting material Separates the bracket from the surface Labor saving – optimized design and innovative fastening solutions help to lower your total cost of installation Engineering support available – contact your local Hilti team for project-specific advice on optimizing the ventilated façade substructure Total system solution – from Hilti you get optimized tools, consumables and services for every step of ventilated façade installation Applications Thermal insulation pad to separate the bracket from the base material For use with suitable bracket Can be installed using suitable anchors and screws ### TECHNICAL DATA: Technical Data | Material composition | PVC (hard) ### ITEMS- 2084397 - Insulation MFT-ISO FOX H M 5mm - Package Size 100 pc - 2081301 - Insulation MFT-ISO 80x160x6 L - Package Size 100 pc - 2081300 - Insulation MFT-ISO 80x80x6 M - Package Size 200 pc
